m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Why Reports Say Canada's Economy Won't Recover For Several Years Posted: reddit ADVERTISEMENT This week the Bank of Canada reiterated our country's weak economic standing by downgrading expectations for growth both this year and next. "Right now, we don't have a sustainable growth picture in Canada," Governor Stephen Poloz said. The Bank is now forecasting that Canada's economy won't recover from the doldrums for several years.
